mapper.select: SELECT mu.id, mu.code, mu.p_id pId, mu.menu_name menuName, mu.url, mu.is_menu isMenu, mu.`level`, mu.sort, mu.`status`, mu.icon, mu.create_time createTime, mu.update_time updateTime FROM xc_menu mu WHERE mu.id IN (SELECT xp.menu_id FROM xc_permission xp WHERE xp.role_id IN (SELECT xur.role_id FROM xc_user_role xur WHERE xur.user_id = #{userId} ) )
